Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
23.01.2013 SH SCR17882 Added OPH411C.PI.TRANSFERDATE
10.05.2012 SH SCR17333 Added PI.TRANSFERDATE
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
17.08.2011 JH SCR16680 Added button Select All
08.04.2011 GB SCR16334 Added multiselection in the OPH411B
01.03.2011 SH SCR16238 Added new admin currency logic (removed GNRL_CURRENCY)
20.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Set the screen in query mode if there is no row in ADMU
09.10.2006 AK SCR11971 made handling cross off buton in prog OPH411C (was task)
25.09.2006 AK SCR11543 fixed bug in task "DetailsBankInterest_Cross_off"
12.09.2006 AK SCR11812 add two new param PI.BANK_ADMNO and PI.BANK_LEDG_NO
if filled in then go directly to task SQL_DetailsBankInterest
05.07.2006 AK SCR11543 added task "DetailsBankInterest_Cross_off"
28.03.2006 AK SCR10689 add description field
12.12.2005 SH SCR9328 Changed BANK_LEDG_NO_CHEQUES to
23.11.2005 SH SCR9328 Removed mult with *-1 for credit/debit amounts, now
the calculation is LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT
21.10.2005 SH SCR9328 Added mult with *-1 for credit/debit amounts
13.10.2005 SH SCR 9279 Extended selection of LGCD with "LGCD_AMOUNDEBIT <> 0 or
LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0"
-- uses for filter on currency
-- selected bank in "OverviewBankTransferAmounts"
-- uses to locate LGCD in "DetailsBankInterest"
-- Global values
-- Shortcut labels
-- Uses for combo box --> v.Currency
-- Shortcut handling
-- Initialize currency selection

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO, min(BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES), min(BANK_NAME), cast(sum(LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/BANK Left outer join :1/LGCD on LGCD_ADMNO = BANK_ADMNO and LGCD_LDGR_NO = BANK_LEDG_NO_ADVANCES and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_DATE > ':3' where BANK_CURRENCY = ':2' group by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO order by BANK_ADMNO, BANK_LEDG_NO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- If the users select an other currency (= filter currency) then OverviewClient
and OverviewCurrency have to be closed immed and have to be restarted
directly again, where task OverviewCurrency located on the selected currency
to get the total amounts
-- Variable uses to locate in "DetailBankInterest", has to be set to null if
another bank is selected
-- Variable uses to locate in "DetailBankInterest", has to be set to null if
another bank is selected

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LGCD_LGCH_ID, LGCD_LINENO, LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK,LGCD_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCD where LGCD_ADMNO = :2 and LGCD_LDGR_NO = :3 and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and LGCD_DATE > ':4' and (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0) order by LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT + LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT)*-1 as decimal(13,2)) FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: if PI.BANK_ADMNO<>0 and PI.BANK_LEDG_NO<>0 then close program after exit
otherwise go back to task 'SQL_OverviewBankTransferAmount' (AK SCR11812)
-- Skip delete if button Select all was pressed
-- Uses to recalculation view of OPH411B if changes are made
-- Perform screen refresh
-- Perform screen refresh
-- Uses to recalculation view of OPH411B if changes are made
-- Perform screen refresh

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select LGCD_LGCH_ID, LGCD_LINENO, LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK,LGCD_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCD
where LGCD_ADMNO = :2 and LGCD_LDGR_NO = :3 and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0) and cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)) < 0
FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: CTRL+H for extra SQL range
This program uses "force record delete" condition
Program handled/delete only one row per call (end task condition : YES/after)
if LGCD_LGCH_ID=0 delete record, otherwise set LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK='Y'

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LGCD_LGCH_ID, LGCD_LINENO, LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT - LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT) as decimal(13,2)), LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK,LGCD_DESCRIPTION from :1/LGCD where LGCD_ADMNO = :2 and LGCD_LDGR_NO = :3 and LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'N' and (LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT <> 0 or LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT <> 0) order by LGCD_VALUEDATE, cast((LGCD_AMOUNTDEBIT + LGCD_AMOUNTCREDIT)*-1 as decimal(13,2)) FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- Only if LGCD_LCCH_ID > 0 update LGCD_DEBITCREDITCHECK = 'Y'
-- else the hole LGDC row has to be deleted
-- If CANCEL pressed or key 'Esc' or an other program called from
-- the menue
-- Check/Save entries
-- v.Amount is mandatory
-- v.ValueDate is mandatory
-- Users change something on screen, ask to store changes
-- Check/save entries
-- Uses to recalculation view of OPH411B if changes are made

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BANK_CURRENCY FROM :1/bank GROUP BY BANK_CURRENCY ORDER BY BANK_CURRENCY FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- Not sure if nulls can be returned.. but better safe than
